A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was OK to mediocre...but I will never use the tomatometer again to judge whether I should go see a movie\, nor will I ever go see a movie spoiler-free again. I feel like I've just been mugged\, and I blame myself as much as the movie\, since I depended only on a tomatometer score and media hype.\n\nSo if you're somehow reading this before you go see the movie\, please reexamine why you are going to go see it. You can objectively see that the tomatometer is not an accurate measure of what average viewers think of the movie.
